datatool.software module¶

Parent: datatool package

Methods¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from various softwares.

Created by: Scott Walton

datatool.software.ASF_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', key='ASF ACCT#')¶

Fully automated cleaning of ASF export files.

datatool.software.CW_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', key='RecordName')¶

Fully automated cleaning of PerfectMind’s free export files.

datatool.software.KS_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs')¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from KickSite.

datatool.software.MB_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', key='MBSystemID')¶

Fully automated cleaning of MindBody’s paid export. Needs expansion to handle the free one.

datatool.software.MS_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', holder='students')¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from Member Solutions.

Note: This is the most well done fix and should be used as an example.

datatool.software.PM_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs', key='RecordName')¶

Fully automated cleaning of PerfectMind’s paid export files.

datatool.software.RM_fix(path, parents=None, date=Timestamp('2018-12-01 23:45:27.376564'))¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from Rainmaker. Returns the file and outputs it to the current working directory.

param path:Full path to the Rainmaker export.
param date:The date the export was pulled from Rainmaker.
param parents:Path to Parents’ Names export file.
datatool.software.ZP_fix(path='/home/vesi/documents/bin/datatool/docs')¶

Fully automated cleaning of exports from ZenPlanner.

datatool.software.merge_KS_SP(kicksiteFile, solupayFile, checkLast=False)¶
